attributes.action: Give all of the families affected by the Hillsbrough 1989 football tragedy justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for anyone who wants to help the families affected by the Hillsbrough football disaster of 1989. And bring justice to the families as they have waited 20 years as all they want is justice

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
